record.description: “Take a Look” is the title of the co-ed revue they dance in and tonight is the night. The place is Mandel Hall and these are just a few of the lively stepping coryphées shown in their tap-dancing number taking part in the revue [presented] by Mirror, the women’s dramatic organization of the University of Chicago. Left to right: Virginia New, Margaret Holahan, Lorraine Watson, Peggy Moore, Virginia Russell, Margaretha Moore, Betty Cason, and Peggy Burns.
